products.title: Stirlo Oyster Cream
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Stirlo Oyster Cream Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlo Oyster Cream Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.productdescription:
Our exclusive ThermoBlock range features soft neutral colours, on a polyester based blackout fabric.
A cream roller blind easily brightens up the space. Our ThermoBlock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. This cream blackout roller has a silver UV-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter, which means this roller is also great for hot offices or sunrooms.  Roller blinds bring a contemporary and modern look to the space, and as all our blinds are child-safe, our roller blinds can be installed anywhere in the house!
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This cream roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Day & Night Effortless Cream
products.metadescription: Day & Night Effortless Cream
products.productdescription: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, our Day & Night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work.

products.title: Burst Pearl Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Burst Pearl Roller Blind. A wipe clean roller blind in a dim out fabric. Perfect for every window big or small, order your free samples here.
products.productdescription: Warm and creamy, the Burst Pearl is the perfect blind if you are needing a lightly coloured blind but white is too sharp for your tastes. Working well with earthier natural colours like Browns and Greens for a warm ambience or blues, whites and random netting on the wall for a nautical theme. An absolute classic, the Pearl will always be the best of beige. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. These blinds are moisture resistant too so can be installed in a kitchen or bathroom. Fed up of the sun spoiling your view of the telly? Install this dimout blind and stop the glare from ruinning your favourite show.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.productdescription: Konya Blackout Butter Cream Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.productdescription: The Palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.metadescription: Ivory Aluminium Venetian
products.productdescription: The Ivory coloured aluminium Venetian blind is a beautifully, creamy-white coloured slat. Ideal for anyone not wanting a pure white slat in their window, but want something that is warmer and more delicate. Keep your blinds looking their best with our easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Amor Pearl Roller Blind
products.metadescription: The Amor Pearl Roller blind has a touch of cream to it, making this a very versatile colour. This is the perfect blind for people who don't want the bright white of some blinds, but like the crisp effect, white gives a room. Additionally, the Amor fabr
products.productdescription: The Amor Pearl Roller blind has a touch of cream to it, making this a very versatile colour. This is the perfect blind for people who don't want the bright white of some blinds, but like the crisp effect, white gives a room. Additionally, the Amor fabrics are brilliant blackout blinds. They are ideal for bedrooms, kitchens and living rooms. They are a durable and tough material which won't fade in the light. If you like these colours check them out as vertical blinds too. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Amor Pearl Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Amor Pearl Vertical Blind
products.productdescription: The Amor Pearl Roller blind has a touch of cream to it, making this a very versatile colour. This is the perfect blind for people who don't want the bright white of some blinds, but like the crisp effect, white gives a room. Additionally, the Amor fabrics are brilliant blackout blinds. They are ideal for bedrooms, kitchens and living rooms. They are a durable and tough material which won't fade in the light. If you like these colours check them out as vertical blinds too. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our vertical blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.productdescription: The Gibson Egg Shell is a light, bright fabric. Use this to help lighten a room and help to make it feel bigger. The light colour will pair with any decor and this blind is suitable for any room in the home - especially bathrooms. The 100% PVC fabric is fully waterproof, meaning that it can be installed right next to a shower without worry about damaging the fabric. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, our Day & Night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Infusion asc Cream Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Infusion ASC Cream Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4102. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which  improves energy efficiency
products.productdescription: Infusion asc Cream Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Mayfair Cream Dimout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Mayfair Cream Dimout Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: The Mayfair Cream Dimout Perfect Fit offers unbridled elegance in an easy-fit form. Rather than installing onto the wall, the blind clips to your actual window frame, for a flush fit that integrates seamlessly into your window. When closed the pleated style means the honeycomb fabric cascades down the glass, as well as offering thermal benefits to help regulate temperature. A milky cream tone creates a delicate neutral, which would pair well with more traditional interiors and antique furnishings. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Mayfair Ivory Dimout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Mayfair Ivory Dimout Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Experience premium shading in its simplest possible form with the Mayfair Ivory Dimout Perfect Fit. This blind clips onto your actual window frame, the brackets sliding in to lock onto your window without need of drilling or tools. The pleated style creates an attractive texture in your window frame, rippling down the glass when closed, and additionally provides thermal benefits to help regulate temperature. The ivory tone offers a classical neutral, its creamy butter-tinted hue pairing especially well with wooden furnishings and stately interiors. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Day & Night Brushed Oyster
products.metadescription: Day & Night Brushed Oyster The Day & Night Brushed Oyster roller blind is a practical and stylish alternative to a venetian blind. The textured sandy-coloured stripes makes this blind a great choice for a more neutral interior. Combining brilliant lig
products.productdescription: The Day & Night Brushed Oyster roller blind is a practical and stylish alternative to a venetian blind. The textured sandy-coloured stripes makes this blind a great choice for a more neutral interior. Combining brilliant light control with a unique, aesthetic design, it’s a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, our Day & Night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.productdescription: Hive Blackout Geo Oyster Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Hive Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Hive GeoBlackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.productdescription: Fitting snugly into the window frame, Perfect Fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Rigid aluminium slats are beautifully showcased in Double Cream Gloss, a soft and sumptuous hue with a high-beam shine. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

This 100% Cotton Butterfly Botanist Carmine Curtain fabric mixes eye-catching contemporary design with a saturated colour palette to create these stunning curtains. These curtains will look beautiful paired with light sage greens and natural wooden tones throughout the home, a perfect addition for dining/ living areas within the home. All our curtains are lovingly handmade within the UK.

products.title: Day & Night Woven Cream
products.metadescription: With its mid-cream colour, the Day & Night Woven Cream Roller blind is perfect for a more neutral interior style, and pairs with other cream furnishings to offer a coherent look. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, it’s a pe
products.productdescription: With its mid-cream colour, the Day & Night Woven Cream Roller blind is perfect for a more neutral interior style, and pairs with other cream furnishings to offer a coherent look. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, it’s a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, our Day & Night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Real Wood Grey Pearl Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: The neutral hue of Grey Pearl pairs beautifully with all colours, making a stylish yet safe choice for the home. Grey can be used to cool vibrant colours or to give a touch of contrast to other neutral tones.
products.productdescription: The neutral hue of Grey Pearl pairs beautifully with all colours, making a stylish yet safe choice for the home. Grey can be used to cool vibrant colours or to give a touch of contrast to other neutral tones. Like all of our real wood Perfect Fit range, we stock a colour-matched venetian blind so you can coordinate your windows and doors Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The venetian slats will gently filter the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Delicate Cream Satin Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Fitting snugly into the window frame, Perfect Fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium blinds are our most hard wearing style, ideal for busy or humid
products.productdescription: Fitting snugly into the window frame, Perfect Fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium blinds are our most hard wearing style, ideal for busy or humid spaces. Our Delicate Cream Satin slat offers a softer take on pure white, with a shimmering mid-gloss for a pearlescent effect. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more.

products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash Dove Grey panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The light grey panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. 
 
As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,.5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make.  A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design. 
 
Panel blinds add a really modern feel to any space and at Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.metadescription: Voile FR Sandshell Cream Panel Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £39.38 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Voile FR fabrics look beautiful up due to their translucent properties in a wide array of neutral shades. 
 Durable and stylish, this translucent cream panel blind allows the light to filter through and is hand-washable. This cream panel is ideal for kitchens as it's flame-retardant. 
 Panel blinds are great for covering large spans of glass or as window dividers due to their large widths and drops.  One of the largest blinds we products at 5 metres width and over 3 metres drop, panel blinds are a modern take on traditional vertical blinds, and are just as stylish when up.

This bold cream and white patterned panel blind will look great in any room and can also be used as a divider.

products.title: Bella Blackout Cream Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Cream Panel Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, soft and warm, our Bella Blackout Cream panel blind blends minimal style with practical design.  A firm favourite, our Bella Blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - Whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom,  in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money.  
 
Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At Swift Direct Blind, quality comes first.  Our panel blinds are expertly cut and assembled by our panel blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do our blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0250 Fabric Colour: Cream Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Dove Grey Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Dove Grey Panel Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
 This Dove Grey panel blind freshens up any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panel blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our panels are great for privacy and light control, especially for large spaces - reaching up to 5 metres width and 3.5 metres drop! 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This grey panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. 
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0265 Fabric Colour: Dove Grey Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Eco Friendly FR Cream Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Eco Friendly FR Cream Panel Blind. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Eco-Friendly, recycled panel blinds are made from 100% PET recycled waste.  This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment! For every Sq. Metre of fabric, 9 PET bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind! 
 
Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new cream roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.  Cream panel blinds are a fantastic way to add warm back into your room, whilst still staying in the neutral colour palette.  Panel blinds are fantastic as room dividers or for large panes of glass due to their large size, up to 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At Swiftdirectblinds, quality is paramount, which is why not only do our hand-made panel blinds come with customer-first service, they now come with a five-year guarantee for extra peace of mind!
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0302 Fabric Colour: Cream Material: 100% Recycled Polyester Lining: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Hampton Dove Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Hampton Dove Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Grey is the new white in the world of interiors, and this Hampton Dove is a particularly on-trend shade. Instead of a block colour, the polyester blind is made up of short strokes of lighter and darker greys, for a lively and organic effect. These horizontal strokes marry well with the pleated ripples that run throughout the fabric, the concertina effect creating its own natural highlights and pooling shadows. The Perfect Fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, for tools-free fitting.  Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Kingston Cream Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Kingston Cream Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Create elegant shading in your window with the Kingston Cream Pleated Perfect Fit. The game-changing blind style fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall above, for a simple tools-free installation system. Colour match your Perfect Fit frame to your UPVC window for an integrated, cohesive look. The Cream hue has a classic elegance that's well suited to traditional interiors. The dimout style allows for some lightfall even when the blind is closed, to enable brightness alongside privacy. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Splash Oyster Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Oyster Electric Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The Splash Oyster electric roller blind is a very light, natural cream colour.  This neutral tone will work well in most spaces and look beautiful when matched with woods throughout the home. Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe.  This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with our Smart Hub (sold seperately).  As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind giving extra peace of mind that you are investing in a product that will stand the test of time. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1893 Fabric Colour: Oyster Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Dove Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Dove Grey Electric Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties.  Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light.  Our Splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites.  
 
 This Splash Dove Grey electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior. The soft grey tone of the fabric will look stunning when paired with natural wooden tones and is the perfect splash of colour to compliment cool, contemporary grey shades. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This grey roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.metadescription: Splash Cream Electric Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A highly popular range, loved by our customers for its simplicity and value for money, our Splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This cream electric roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This electric roller blind with accompanying white components and cream fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. An adaptation on the classic roller blind, these electric roller blinds are child-safe by design and add a modern touch to your window.  
 
Why not splash out even more, and upgrade to the Smart Home Hub, our wireless option that can be used with Amazon Alexa and the Google Home Hub. This makes electric roller blinds perfect for hard to reach windows, and they can be opened or shut from the comfort of your own phone, perfect for keeping unwanted visitors away when on holiday.  Our electric roller blinds are value for money and easy to install. For ease of mind, all our products come with a 5 year guarantee, made in the heart of the Yorkshire textile homeland, Swift Direct Blinds upholds high quality products at highly-competitive online prices.
